allow:
Bash(git -C /c/dev/intelliservicebeta/project commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add technician workflow improvements

- Require clock-in before starting work on tickets with popup alert
- Add "Get Directions" button to open maps for customer location
- Fix ticket completion flow with success modal and clear feedback
- Hide Quick Actions for completed tickets, show completion indicator

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /c/dev/intelliservicebeta/project commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Improve parts workflow for technicians

- Add Part modal now only shows parts from truck inventory \(no fallback\)
- Shows "No Parts on Truck" message with link to request parts
- New "Need Parts" modal with proper form instead of prompts
- Tech can select specific part from catalog, set quantity and urgency
- Ticket goes on hold when parts are requested

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /c/dev/intelliservicebeta/project commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix Parts Management low stock count to match Dashboard

Both Dashboard and Parts Management now use vw_reorder_alerts
to count low stock items, ensuring consistent numbers.

The view considers reserved qty, inbound POs, and dynamic
reorder points based on usage patterns.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
